longBusinessSummary: BF Utilities Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the infrastructure business in India. The company develops the Bangalore Mysore Infrastructure Corridor Project, a 164 kilometers tolled expressway connecting Bengaluru and Mysuru; and operates a 30 kilometers bypass road connecting the twin cities of Hubli and Dharwad in North Karnataka. In addition, it is involved in electricity generation through windmills. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Pune, India.
